title: Ep - 149 - PRODUCER OF REAL HOUSEWIVES OF BEVERLY HILLS
description:
Alex Baskin, Co-Creator and Executive Producer of Bravo’s Real Housewives of Beverly Hills and President, Programming & Development at Evolution Media, discusses how the show was developed, casting the first season, behind the scenes of the show, and what has happened to several of the show’s most memorable faces. 


Rob Cesternino from Rob Has a Podcast reviews the Celebrity Big Brother finale. 


Jessica Zadeh, Host of ‘The Real Housewife of The Westside’ Podcast & Co-Host of ‘The #nojudgement Podcast’ reviews the documentary Generation Wealth on Amazon. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
